name: Service of process; claims Cross References
text:
Service of process; claims.  Except as otherwise provided by the county charter, section 54-31 shall apply. [L 1949, c 86, §18; RL 1955, §146-116; HRS ; am L 1973, c 134, §4]  Rules of Court

  Service upon agency of county, HRCP rule 4(d)(7).
